## Description

Create a random gene expression dataset of the same size as a real one.

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(data.table)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
require(magrittr)
library(tidyr)
library(igraph)
set.seed(1510)
`%ni%` <- Negate(`%in%`)
```

## Define variables

Define the input dataset file:

```{r define_files}
rnaseq_file = "/work/ccnr/j.aguirreplans/Databases/TCGA/2022-11-18-Dataset/TCGA/out/reads/tumor/filter_genes_low_counts/rnaseq_filtered_files_by_sample_group/tcga_rnaseq_TCGA-BRCA_female.csv"
```

Read the dataset:

```{r}
RNAseq = fread(rnaseq_file)
```

The dataset contains `r as.integer(ncol(RNAseq)-1)` columns (case IDs) and `r nrow(RNAseq)` rows (genes).

```{r}
head(RNAseq[1:10,1:5])
```
